name: Deep Water Solo VR Climbing
description: Rock climbing requires coordination, balance, timing, and problem solving skills. Put your skills to the test over deep water and see if you can top these tricky routes without taking a plunge. Now includes overhangs, cracks, traverses and massive walls. There is now also a re-creation of "The Boulder Problem" from the Oscar winning documentary "Free Solo".  More routes and features will be added every month.  Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Deep-Water-Solo-VR-Climbing-105342677511144
